title: Out Now: Lichtspielhaus Slab
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/highnoon-poster.jpg)

Lichtspielhaus Slab is an ultra condensed typeface based on Lichtspielhaus. It still transports you back to a time where neon lights and marquee letters decorated cinema facades. This time with Slab.  
 [You can get it at myfonts if you like it](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typocalypse/lichtspielhaus-slab/)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/1.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/2.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/3.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/4.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/5.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/6.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/7.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/8.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/9.jpg)

There are 8 styles: Hairline, Thin, Light, Regular, Medium, Bold, Black and Heavy.  
“Lichtspielhaus Slab” is the third part of a Type Noir Quadrilogy.

[[€73,99 ↘ €14,80] Until March 16, 2015 at Myfonts ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typocalypse/lichtspielhaus-slab/)
author: Typocalypse-Now

comments.content: for what it is worth, you shouldn’t stain such a wonderful typeface by such a pain-in-the-ass dumping price. i.m.ho.
